reviewText: Great movie! It reminds me of my childhood.
It arrived in a matter of a few days. So happy with my purchase!
I would watch this over and over as a kid.  I finally found it on Amazon and purchased it right away.  Quick shipping.

Since I was a kid, I have always watched La India Maria, so what a pleasant surprise to find it again! This movie shows the struggles of an immigrant in the United States, but in a light-hearted hilarious manner. From her trouble with English to all the slapstick comedy, this is one movie I recommend for people of all ages looking for a laugh.
